WSUS31 KKCI 170955 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 15E 
VALID UNTIL 1155Z 
FL CSTL WTRS 
FROM 210ENE TRV-190ENE PBI-90NE PBI-120ENE TRV-210ENE TRV 
AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 27025KT. TOPS TO FL350. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 171155-171555 
FROM 110SE CHS-230ENE TRV-190E PBI-70ENE PBI-50SE OMN-90ENE 
CRG-110SE CHS 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
